reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Hi folks,I got this camera a week ago since my old laptop's internal camera was like 0.3 megapixels and the video image it was recording was just terrible. So I decided to come here and get some nice camera for a good value. Reviews were different, good and bad... And guess what? I've got it, hook it up to my desktop computer (just on the top of the monitor), the good thing is a plug and play out of the box for windows 10 and I was surprised about the picture quality. It's just awesome! I really love it. So clean and crisp.I'm using this web camera on a daily basis for my work (remotely now lol). It works with all apps I've tried it, Webex, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, GoToMeeting, you name it, works with all apps just fine. All people on the other end of the call immediately mentioned that the quality of my video calls greatly improved. It also has a built-in microphone, so you don't have to worry about getting an additional one. The USB cord of the camera is pretty long. It helped me a lot since my desktop computer's case sits next to my desk on the floor. The camera has a pretty good engineered holder, so you can attach it to practically any possible monitor, but even in case if not, it comes with a mini tripod, which you can attach to the camera's holder. Oh, another very important future that the camera comes with a mechanical privacy shutter, which you can close when the camera is not in use.Overall great value and quality for the price. Absolutely recommend if you are having daily video calls, meetings or just web chats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, better than Ring
reviews.reviewText: The recording quality is great, the motion sensor is working nicely! For cloud storage you pay 3 bucks/month or 2.50/month is you purchase a whole year storage, I think is a fair price and my family is happy with this camera. The app is easy to use, you can add your family members to see the camera in their app.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Webcam
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting much but it does it's job. The quality is better than I expected, with it just being a webcam but it exceeded my expectations. It focuses nicely and taking pictures is good with it. Can be slow to keep up with quick movements sometimes but all in all a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Calidad de la cámara
reviews.reviewText: La cámara parecerá se baja resolución, pero vaya fue mi sorpresa qué superó mis expectativas, buscaba algo provisional en lo que iba y formateaba mi laptop pero termi n o sorprendiendome.Es fácil de usar, no requiere de descargar nada, solo es conectarla a tu dispositivo y ya estara completamente funcional, totalmente recomendada.El tripie parece frágil y guango pero a la hora de usarlo es bastante rígido y cumple con su objetivo tanto que lo he usado con mi celular para mantener mi celular estable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Picture quality is great, but causes an echo during videoconferences.
reviews.reviewText: I've had this camera a few months. The install went pretty well. I had to reboot a few times to pick the camera up, but once it was recognized, that has worked well. The camera does not clamp securely onto my external monitor. I fixed that problem by getting a separate flexible arm that clamps onto my desk and holds the camara. I love the physical lens cover so I can easily control when the camera is capturing an image. The picture quality is great. I love having an external camera instead of relying on the one on my laptop so my laptop can stay connected to the docking station and I don't have to try to get it moved over to the center of my desk every time I have a videoconference. Unfortnately there there are two remaining problems that are making me now decide to look for another camera:1. Echos: When using this camera, is it causes an echo on videoconferencing that others can hear. I cannot hear it. It is so annoying to others that immediately people start talking about it and asking if the call can be done using some other audio. It definitely happens on Microsoft Teams calls as others have said in the Questions section for this product on Amazon. I can't remember if it happened on Webex videocalls also. Others have said switching the audio source solves that problem.2. Wide View: This may be standard on these cameras. I'll find out when I shop for a new one, but the view is much wider than my native laptop camera. I can't find any way on the camera to "crop" it so that it shows only the person during videoconference and not a lot of what is to the right and left of the person. I solved that problem by installing OBS Studio and the OBS virtual camera. OBS allows me to crop the picture and then uses that video as the "camera" in Microsoft Teams. That works very well to get a good cropped video, however, the image quality went way down and it freezes up sometimes, so it is not a great solution because I end up not having smooth starts to videoconferences with all the troubleshooting I have to do to get OBS, the webcam, and the conferecing software to all work together.I hope I can find a camera that works seemlessly so that the now much more frequent videoconferences, thanks to the pandemic, will go more smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Video Calls Suck But At least The Quality is Good
reviews.reviewText: We all hate video calls. They suck. But the builtin cam on my laptop was god awful and looked straight up my nose.This sits on monitor of laptop or external and is good quality. Still hate video calls but i look good hating them now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars BREAKS SUPER EASILY
reviews.reviewText: I was in a zoom call and I lifted up my computer when the webcam fell off and onto my desk. When I put it back on my computer the camera was glitching and totally unusable. I bought another one because I figured a smack on the desk was my fault.Next one I bought and plugged into my laptop. My computer tipped back sitting on my bed, so the webcam didn't even fall it slowly leaned about 10 inches until I was resting on my bed. This one started glitching too!!The camera quality is good, but it is not worth it if the smallest bump or blunder is going to render it useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great video quality!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install, just plug it in. Very good video quality. Works for everything I needed it for!

It came in a couple of business days. Very affordable. Small package. Couldn't be happier with the purchase. Took 2 minutes to setup. Compatible with OBS studio, Zoom conferencing or any other video app for Windows 10. Can easily attach and remove from PC monitor for easy storage or repositioning. Has standard 1080p @ 30fps video quality but can be adjusted to less if need be. Can't really beat the price and the other reviews are saying the same thing pretty much.
Cumpre o seu papel com muita qualidade. Basta plugar e pronta para usar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be an okay camera. Picture quality is good for me. Much better than my old Logitech. Low light level capture is also very good. I don't know about the sound as I haven't used it yet. It's good value for the money and I wou;d recommend it.
